watchsubpagesprefix: Used for the label of the input box of [[Special:WatchSubpages]]. All pages that begin with this string will be displayed.
watchsubpages-nochanges: If no changes are made, the user is informed that nothing was added to the user's watchlist.
watchsubpages-legend: Heading of dialog box on [[Special:WatchSubpages]] that contains listing of subpages.
watchsubpages-explain:
An introduction/explanation about the [[Special:WatchSubpages|subpage watching function]].

Refers to {{msg-mw|Watchsubpages-submit}}.
watchsubpages-added-expiry:
Message appears after at least 1 page is added to the watchlist. Message shown after selecting to watch a page temporarily. The selection is made from the watchlist expiry dropdown options in the pop up.

Followed by list of page titles which are added.

Parameters:
* $1 - page title
* $2 - the expiry selected
watchsubpages-added-indefinitely:
Message appears after at least 1 page is added to the watchlist indefinitely. The selection is made from the watchlist expiry dropdown options in the pop up.

Followed by list of page titles which are added.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of page titles which are added
